merchandise.name: Witchy Tee
merchandise.description: Black T-shirt with a classic witch silhouette flying on a broomstick.

merchandise.name: Pumpkin Mug
merchandise.description: Ceramic mug designed like a carved pumpkin. Perfect for your morning brew!

merchandise.name: Ghostly Pillow
merchandise.description: Decorative pillow with cute ghost patterns. Adds a spooky touch to any couch!

merchandise.name: Vampire Cap
merchandise.description: Baseball cap with embroidered vampire fangs and bat wings.

merchandise.name: Skeleton Apron
merchandise.description: Kitchen apron with a humorous ribcage and bones design. Get spooky while cooking!

merchandise.name: Zombie Socks
merchandise.description: Comfy socks with playful zombie graphics. Walk like the undead!

merchandise.name: Haunted House Poster
merchandise.description: A vintage-style poster featuring a haunted mansion. Ideal for Halloween home decor!

merchandise.name: Cursed Jewelry Box
merchandise.description: An intricately designed box with eerie patterns. Store your treasures... if you dare!

merchandise.name: Monster Slippers
merchandise.description: Fuzzy slippers that resemble monster feet. Stomp around your house in style!

merchandise.name: Goblin Goblet
merchandise.description: A goblet fit for ghoulish drinks. Green-tinted with a goblin face design.

merchandise.name: Phantom Candle Holder
merchandise.description: A candle holder shaped like a phantom's hand. Perfect for setting the Halloween mood!

merchandise.name: Banshee Blanket
merchandise.description: A soft throw blanket with banshee and ghost patterns. Wrap yourself in spooky comfort!
